name: df-odz
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(codz, cmpt(s0, cn, cmpt(s1, crab(s1, cz, wceq(co(cv(s1), cgcd, cv(s0)), nat1)), cinf(crab(s2, cn, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, co(co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)), cmin, nat1))), cr, clt))))
comment: Define the order function on the class of integers mod N. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.) (Revised by AV, 26-Sep-2020.)
